Joint Member Registration Guide

Welcome to the New Member Registration Guide! This guide will help you register a Joint Member in the system. Follow each step carefully.

Step 1: Group or Joint Details

  • Full Names of Joint Member(s)
  • Effective Date of joint membership agreement

Step 2: Add Contact Details

Location Information:

  • Postal Address
  • Postal Code
  • Country of Residence
  • District
  • Town

Contact Details:

  • Mobile Phone No
  • Telephone No
  • Email Address

Communication Preferences:

  • Accept SMS Notifications
  • Send SMS Queries
  • Receive Statement Via Email or Post

Additional Information:

  • Physical Address
  • Account Mandate

Step 3: Statutory Details

  • Residency & Citizenship Status
  • Tax Information
  • Account Preferences
  • Compliance Screening
  • Document Processing Dates

Step 4: Account Details

  • Select Investment Fund
  • Choose Fee Category
  • Assign an Agent
  • Tax Display Preference
  • Dividend Withdrawal Option
  • Additional Instructions (Optional)

Step 5: Bank Details

  • Choose whether to provide bank details now or skip for later
  • Bank Name, Bank Branch, Account Number, Account Name, Currency, Account Type, Default Account

End of Joint Member Registration Guide
